Question: This person's parents, George **** (1731–1805), and his wife Cassandra (1739–1827), were members of substantial gentry families.
Hints: By the next morning, this person realised she had made a mistake and withdrew her acceptance.
This person was born on 16 December 1775 at Steventon rectory and publicly christened on 5 April 1776.
After finishing Lady Susan, this person attempted her first full-length novel — Elinor and Marianne.
